import React, { useState } from "react"; import styles from './UseForm.module.css'; const UserForm = () => { const [isWrong, setIsWrong] = useState(false); const [enteredName, setEnteredName] = useState(''); const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (enteredName.trim() > 0) { } else { setIsWrong(true) } } const cardNameHandler = (event) => { setEnteredName(event.target.value); } return








} export default UserForm;
